title: "China sets up science-tech ethics committee for risk prevention amid global AI craze"
excerpt: "China's Ministry of Industry and Information and Technology (MIIT) announced on Tuesday the establishment of a committee and expert group for science and technology ethics. Experts noted the move pioneers risk prevention in the field amid rapid development of artificial intelligence (AI) across the globe."
